name: h3
description: Experience unmatched performance with the 2026 Louisville Slugger Atlas Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat, crafted for players seeking balance and power. Featuring a USSSA 1.15 BPF certification, this bat boasts a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter and a striking grey, teal, and white colorway. The SL Hyper Superlight Alloy construction ensures a light swing with maximum pop, while the XPND End Cap expands the sweet spot for enhanced performance. Additionally, the Pro Design Knob Taper and Premium LS Pro Comfort Grip provide superior leverage, control, and comfort during every swing.
